entries.headline: LTX-2 enters the chat

entries.headline: Fresh seeds: Imagen 3 & Grok

entries.headline: Claude gets a brain boost
entries.blurb: Upgraded our 'claude-large' alias to the shiny new Opus 4.6. The bees are buzzing with higher IQs today.

entries.headline: Mistral moves to a new hive
entries.blurb: Migrated Mistral models to OVHcloud infrastructure for better stability. A little spring cleaning for the backend.

entries.headline: Case sensitive confusion
entries.blurb: Fixed a capitalization typo that was confusing Mistral. Sometimes the difference between 'Key' and 'key' is everything.

entries.headline: Streaming the video flow
entries.blurb: Wired up SSE streaming for the new video models. The pixels should flow like honey now.

entries.headline: Documentation gardening
entries.blurb: Polished the Z-Image upscaler config and watered the GPU docs. Clear guides help the community grow.
